content.p: Discover how our research transforms lives and shapes the future. The University of Nottingham is at the forefront of a global revolution – decarbonising the maritime industry. Indonesia’s ambition to be southeast Asia’s electric vehicle powerhouse is a cornerstone of its net zero commitment. The University of Nottingham, a key partner in growing the country’s EV infrastructure and skills base, is helping deliver this green transport revolution. The University of Nottingham is Training the Next Generation of Chemists for a Net-Zero East Midlands Researchers are visiting 2,000 farms in Malawi, collecting soil and crop samples to help fight a challenge to the health of millions across sub-Saharan Africa How the Hungry for Words project is raising awareness of eating disorders in men Culture and communication Healthy lives Society and communities Sustainable futures
